channel.title: Comments on: Destruction All-Stars studio Lucid Games has been handed the Twisted Metal franchise, sources have told VGC.

item.title: By: HyruleCool
item.dc:creator: HyruleCool
item.description: Hope they do a better job than they did with destruction all stars. I was excited to play it, but it kinda feel flat and was kinda set up like a game that should've just been free from the get go.
item.content:encoded: Hope they do a better job than they did with destruction all stars. I was excited to play it, but it kinda feel flat and was kinda set up like a game that should’ve just been free from the get go.

item.title: By: MisterMetroid
item.dc:creator: MisterMetroid
item.description: Why did they not just do this in the beginning instead of all stars‚Ä¶
item.content:encoded: Why did they not just do this in the beginning instead of all stars‚Ä¶

item.title: By: RetroRedneck
item.dc:creator: RetroRedneck
item.description: I would love a new twisted metal game!
item.content:encoded: I would love a new twisted metal game!

item.title: By: Lestweforget5038
item.dc:creator: Lestweforget5038
item.description: DAS was pretty fun. But I think they will make a better TM game.
item.content:encoded: DAS was pretty fun. But I think they will make a better TM game.

item.title: By: gusbelmont
item.dc:creator: gusbelmont
item.description: Im sorry for twisted metal then.

item.title: By: doctorbloodborne
item.dc:creator: doctorbloodborne
item.description: Please don't be online only/live service...

item.title: By: SomePiePlays
item.dc:creator: SomePiePlays
item.description: One of the best games I played 16 - 20 years ago on PS1.
item.content:encoded: One of the best games I played 16 – 20 years ago on PS1.

item.title: By: CleR6
item.dc:creator: CleR6
item.description:
Not familiar with the studio but am beyond familiar with the TM series.
Easily TM1 was the most played game for me and my buds back in the PS1 days. I swear my Playstation One was so hot, you could've cooked eggs on it.
I can see the multiplayer being a big aspect of the reboot.
item.content:encoded:
Not familiar with the studio but am beyond familiar with the TM series.

Easily TM1 was the most played game for me and my buds back in the PS1 days. I swear my Playstation One was so hot, you could’ve cooked eggs on it.

I can see the multiplayer being a big aspect of the reboot.

item.title: By: Yeafam7945
item.dc:creator: Yeafam7945
